page.title: 11SMALL COMPANY, THWAITES
page.content: Mountain Method is a small company that was started four years ago by two people.They make waterproof coats and trousers to match, and a few tents and rucksacks. They cut about 30 to 50 garments at a time. There are roughly four miles of cloth and 250 miles of cotton in stock. The number of people employed has gradually increased and now there are 30. The people who work for Mountain Method work at home and they are called outworkers. The workers get paid so much a garment. All the packing and sending off is done in our nearest town, Millom. They are not going to open a factory because they are afraid of going bankrupt.The garments are sold in Ambleside or Hawkshead and big towns like that. The owner says that sales go up on a rainy weekend!
